snippet.title: Chris Watts' Double Life Is Finally Revealed
snippet.description:
Chris Watts killed his wife and daughters, then buried their bodies behind an oil facility. This much is common knowledge after Watts' story and trial played out in the press. However, much of what went on behind the scenes is not widely known, including affairs in addition to the one Watts took part in with his coworker. The killing of Shanann Watts and her daughters, Bella and Celeste (along with a third, unborn child), is all the more resonant because their lives are preserved in the social media record. So too is the false front that Chris Watts presented to the world. Here, Chris Watts' double life is finally revealed.

#DoubleLife #ChrisWatts #Crime

Chris Watts changed overnight | 0:00
An affair with Nichol Kessinger | 1:08

Hitting the delete button | 2:55
Chris allegedly had multiple affairs | 3:44
The murders seemed premeditated | 4:20
The perfect husband | 5:19
Romance with Kessinger turned sour | 6:15
Financial troubles | 7:04
'A family man' | 7:46
Shanann suspected he was cheating | 8:20
Chris wanted a 'fresh start' | 9:07
